00127    /*
00128    * Serialize to/from an archive. 
00129    */
00130    template <class SystemType>
00131    template <class Archive>
00132    void IntraBondTensorAutoCorr<SystemType>::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00133    {
00134       if (!isInitialized_) {
00135          UTIL_THROW("Error: Object not initialized.");
00136       }
00137 
00138       // Data not set by readParam
00139       ar & accumulator_;
00140       ar & nMolecule_;
00141 
00142       // Data set by readParam (check consistency).
00143       serializeCheck(ar, speciesId_, "speciesId");
00144       serializeCheck(ar, nBond_, "nBond");
00145       serializeCheck(ar, capacity_, "capacity");
00146    }
